rooms.description: A large open space designed for family gatherings and daily activities.
Adjacent to the kitchen, offering a comfortable dining experience.
Fully equipped with modern appliances and adequate storage. Follows local building norms for ventilation.
Spacious bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom, placed in the south-east as per Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom for guests or children, located adjacent to other living spaces.
A full bathroom shared between the bedrooms and guest areas.
A quiet retreat for reading and study, positioned in a northeast corner to enhance focus as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance aligning with Vastu principles by facing north for positive energy.
East-facing window to invite morning sunlight and promote well-being.
South door ensuring proper airflow and ventilation in the kitchen area.
North window to provide a calming ambiance and balance energy as per Vastu.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom for family members or guest usage, ensuring ample space and privacy.
A dedicated bathroom for guests, positioned conveniently on the first floor.

openings.description: A safe and accessible staircase connecting ground and first floors. Designed to meet building codes.

rooms.description: An expansive terrace offering panoramic views and outdoor living space. Equipped with seating areas and landscaping in accordance with Vastu principles.
